statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT data_size, suspected_activity FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT logging_id, source_ip, destination_ip, suspected_activity FROM network_traffic_data WHERE suspected_activity = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE suspected_activity = TRUE;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, data_size FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT timestamp, data_size, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT logging_id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip LIKE '192.168.%' ORDER BY logging_id ASC;
SELECT id, source_address, destination_address FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT destination_address, protocol, data_size FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT id, event_type, timestamp FROM suspicious_activities ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT source_address, destination_address, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_size > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_address, destination_address, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' AND data_size > 500 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, source_address, destination_address, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, source_address, destination_address, data_size FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_address LIKE '192.%' OR destination_address LIKE '10.%' ORDER BY data_size DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, event_type, description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE event_type = 'DDoS Attack' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, data_size, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, data_size FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM detected_threats);
SELECT t.threat_id, a.activity_description, t.threat_level FROM detected_threats t JOIN suspicious_activities a ON t.activity_id = a.activity_id;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, data_size FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE destination_ip = '192.168.1.1' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_description LIKE '%malicious%' ORDER BY activity_id;
SELECT log_id, source_ip, destination_ip, data_size FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY data_size DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, destination_ip, source_ip, data_size FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE data_size > 1000 LIMIT 10;

SELECT threat_id, threat_level, activity_description FROM detected_threats JOIN suspicious_activities ON detected_threats.activity_id = suspicious_activities.activity_id ORDER BY threat_level DESC, activity_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT timestamp, amount_of_data FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE amount_of_data > 1000;
SELECT * FROM detected_attacks WHERE attack_type LIKE '%DDoS%';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP'
SELECT AVG(amount_of_data) AS average_data FROM network_traffic_logs
SELECT activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE detection_method = 'Firewall'
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM traffic_patterns
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE port_number = 80;
SELECT destination_ip, data_size FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY data_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE reason ILIKE '%attack%';
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY source_ip HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT source_ip, destination_ip, port_number FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT id, timestamp, reason FROM suspicious_activities WHERE reason ILIKE '%attack%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_logs WHERE action IN ('login', 'logout') ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
